home.hero_text_right: , one pixel and one line of code at time
home.description_text: A self-taught Full Stack Web Developer with over 3 years of experience in the industry. I craft robust and dynamic web solutions that seamlessly integrate user experience with business objectives, delivering high-impact digital products.
home.experience_1_description_title_1: Development of a Parser for Organizing Government Public Contracts
home.experience_1_description_description_1: In charge of developing a parser to systematically organize government public contracts, ensuring the information is efficiently stored and accessible.
home.experience_1_description_description_2_l: Creation and management of SQL databases and Entity-Relationship (ER) diagrams to structure contract data.
Development of a parser in Java to read XML documents and store the extracted data in a structured database.
Streamlining the data processing workflow to optimize the management and retrieval of public contract information.
home.experience_2_description_title_1: Maintenance and Development of New Features for an Online Esports Academy
home.experience_2_description_description_1: Responsible for the maintenance and continuous development of new features for an online platform dedicated to esports education. This involves overseeing both front-end and back-end systems, ensuring the seamless operation of the website and its functionalities.
home.experience_2_description_description_2_l: Full-stack management of the website, including front-end and back-end maintenance.
Business line analysis to identify and implement opportunities for growth.
Continuous improvement of user experience through feature updates and optimization.
